desription: An aura eminates from the caster, healing all friendly targets within range.
A wave of energy releases from the caster, curing all status effects from friendly targets within range.
Vines grow from nearby surfaces, and grapple the target locking them in place.
The caster unleashes a fit of rage, causing their attacks to do extra damage.
The caster vanishes and become invisible from all targets.
An undead entity rasies from the ground to fight for/under the command of the caster.
A beast spirit entity appears to fight for/under the command of the caster.
A wave of energy virbrates around the caster, and the casters movement speed is increased. This also makes the caster harder to hit.
